title: Senior Content Editor
job_overview:
As a senior content editor, you will be responsible for maintaining the highest standards of quality for our content. The ideal candidate is a skilled writer with a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of the unique requirements of web writing. Your expertise will be key to guiding our writers and ensuring our content meets the needs of our audience. 

Key Responsibilities
-Edit a variety of digital content formats, including landing pages and blogs.
-Meticulously identify and correct errors, fluff, and inconsistencies to maintain clarity and adherence to company standards.
-Verify the accuracy of all information to maintain the company's credibility and integrity.
-Ensure all content is optimized for search engines and adheres to SEO best practices.
-Develop and enforce editorial standards and best practices for the content team.
-Maintain consistency in tone, voice, and style across all content.
-Supervise the quality of content produced by other writers.

Qualifications And Skills
-A minimum of 2 years of legal content writing experience is required; personal injury experience is a plus. 
-Minimum of 3 to 5 years relevant experience as an editor
-Strong portfolio of published work, demonstrating writing and editing skills
-Exceptional attention to detail, ensuring all content is meticulously reviewed and free from errors
-Excellent command of the English language for both written and oral communication
-Good communication and interpersonal skills
-Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage time effectively
-Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace
-A good grasp of SEO and basic digital marketing principles


Basic Requirements
-Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
-Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
-Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection in case of outages

Work Details
-Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8:30 AM Manila Time
-Location: Anywhere in the Philippines

Why Join Us?
-Stable employment
-Competitive salary
-Bi-monthly salary
-A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
-Work-life balance 
-Work-from-home opportunity

*** The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.
For interested applicants kindly send your CV to Upgrade to see actual info

(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)
